item.title: WATCH: Pilot walks away from plane crash ‘without a scratch’
item.description: New Hampshire pilot Dave Lennon, 65, was practicing takeoffs and landings when, he said, his plane stalled.

item.title: Russian held in US to be freed in exchange for Fogel release, Kremlin says
item.description: Detained in Russia since 2021, Fogel landed back in the U.S. on Tuesday.

item.title: Musk's son 'Lil X' steals spotlight in the Oval Office
item.description: The billionaire has brought his four-year-old to numerous Washington events.

item.title: As Trump pushes whirlwind agenda, DOJ is challenged to defend his orders in court
item.description: As Donald Trump presses his breakneck effort to remake the government, the flurry of lawsuits pushing back have seemingly overwhelming the lawyers def...

item.title: Democrats vow to fight shutdown of consumer watchdog agency
item.description: President Donald Trump has said the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau was "very important to get rid of."
